en.title: FE Welcomes QP Wearer, Her Excellency President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo of the Philippines!
en.content: Her Excellency President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo of the Philippines is a proud and happy wearer of FE's Quantum Pendant, seen here posing with the children of FE leader.

meta.description: Her Excellency President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo of the Philippines is a proud and happy wearer of FE's Quantum Pendant, seen here posing with the children of FE leader.
